sqlMap.select: SELECT entityCode, entityCodeNamespace FROM $prefix$entity WHERE entityCode = #entityCode# AND entityCodeNamespace = #entityCodeNamespace#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO $prefix$entity ( entityGuid, codingSchemeGuid, entityCode, entityCodeNamespace, isDefined, isAnonymous, isActive, description, owner, status, effectiveDate, expirationDate, entryStateGuid ) VALUES ( #id#, #codingSchemeId#, #entity.entityCode#, #entity.entityCodeNamespace#, #entity.isDefined#, #entity.isAnonymous#, #entity.isActive#, #entity.entityDescription.content#, #entity.owner#, #entity.status#, #entity.effectiveDate#, #entity.expirationDate#, #entryStateId# )
